name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver-Metrotown (Burnaby), an IHG Hotel
description: Contemporary lodging with an outdoor pool & an exercise room, plus a free breakfast bar & WiFi.

owner.name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver-Metrotown (Burnaby), an IHG Hotel (Owner)

address: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver-Metrotown (Burnaby), an IHG Hotel, 4405 Central Blvd, Burnaby, BC V5H 4M3

featured_reviews.review_id: I was impressed with the hotel from the moment I entered the door. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The little touches left in my room as a welcome made me feel like my business was appreciated. A nice breakfast brunch was included in the stay which was a nice addition.  The only criticism I'd give was the room was marketed as "top floor city view" and my window literally looked out onto the roof. Not much of a city view however the room itself was quite nice. Lots of great amenities near by including a very large shopping mall and the metro station.
featured_reviews.review_text: I was impressed with the hotel from the moment I entered the door. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The little touches left in my room as a welcome made me feel like my business was appreciated. A nice breakfast brunch was included in the stay which was a nice addition.  The only criticism I'd give was the room was marketed as "top floor city view" and my window literally looked out onto the roof. Not much of a city view however the room itself was quite nice. Lots of great amenities near by including a very large shopping mall and the metro station.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Michelle Grodecki,

Thank you for choosing us, we appreciate your positive feedback about we did to welcome you and our staff, we are always trying to do our best to deliver a good experience for you and also glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us due to it!

We hope your next stay is just around the corner, looking forward to welcoming you back soon Michelle Grodecki.


Scott J
General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: Staying at the Holiday Inn Express in Metrotown was the best idea ever! The staff were really friendly and my wife and I were able to get everything we needed in walking distance. I just wish breakfast was until 11. We are a young couple so we like to sleep in a little bit while on vacation. The breakfast quality was not bad. A little bit overcooked but still enjoyable. The room was very comfortable. We also loved the fact that the rooms walls were soundproofed ;). We will definately be back again.
featured_reviews.review_text: Staying at the Holiday Inn Express in Metrotown was the best idea ever! The staff were really friendly and my wife and I were able to get everything we needed in walking distance. I just wish breakfast was until 11. We are a young couple so we like to sleep in a little bit while on vacation. The breakfast quality was not bad. A little bit overcooked but still enjoyable. The room was very comfortable. We also loved the fact that the rooms walls were soundproofed ;). We will definately be back again.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Reading those past reviews of unhappy customers makes me think they were in the wrong hotel.
My family and I booked a room but at the last minute had unexpected guests coming with us.
Brandon at the front desk was very pleasant to remind the hotel policy  that we can't be all in the same room. He offered we get another room at the lowest discounted price he could give us.
I also got the first room with the extra pillows as I requested weeks ahead. Holiday Inn is the best property for me!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Tina Dolor,

We really appreciate the time dedicated and thank you for all the feedback and comments on your last stay.
Great to hear that you found our staff friendly and helpful and now we know that we are not the only ones who loves Brandon. He is so nice, right? We are glad to hear that we could make such as good experience for you and you enjoy your stay as a result.

We look forward to your next visit Tina Dolor.

Scott J
General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: I appreciate this hotel makes an effort. The staff are well trained and courteous. They have a fantastic continental breakfast. The hotel is clean and well maintained. The outdoor pool is reasonably heated, and offers a comfortable swim. We used the fitness centre, and found the equipment clean and in good shape. We felt very secure in the building. The proximity to the skytrain station makes it easy to get around Vancouver. I would highly recommend this location.
featured_reviews.review_text: I appreciate this hotel makes an effort. The staff are well trained and courteous. They have a fantastic continental breakfast. The hotel is clean and well maintained. The outdoor pool is reasonably heated, and offers a comfortable swim. We used the fitness centre, and found the equipment clean and in good shape. We felt very secure in the building. The proximity to the skytrain station makes it easy to get around Vancouver. I would highly recommend this location.

featured_reviews.review_id: Central location in Metrotown with free parking and a breakfast with great service, clean food facilities and seating area, quality food offerings.  Of all the hotels with free breakfasts we have experienced, this was the best well done.  The room was super clean but the bathroom had a sour odor which the staff quickly addressed within hours by replacing the shower curtains.  Our room had a window which opens for fresh air which was great for sleeping.  Our room faces the sky train which can be noisy but stops  around midnight ( ear plugs are also supplied if needed ).
featured_reviews.review_text: Central location in Metrotown with free parking and a breakfast with great service, clean food facilities and seating area, quality food offerings.  Of all the hotels with free breakfasts we have experienced, this was the best well done. Our room had a window which opens for fresh air which was great for sleeping.  Our room faces the sky train which can be noisy but stops  around midnight ( ear plugs are also supplied if needed ).

featured_reviews.review_id:
Looks recently renovated so it's clean and modern. Super friendly people at the front desk, housekeeping and breakfast area on the second floor.

Quick note on the light switches, there's one in the room that's really hard to find and it controls the lighting above the bed - see the uploaded picture for a tiny black switch next to the wall power outlets.

Free parking underground is great and easy to access using the hotel elevators. If you get there late evening, you will need your hotel key card to open the gates. It's also part of a shopping mall so you have access to lots of food options.

Looking forward to a return trip!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Francis S,

Thank you for all the feedback and comments on your recent stay.
Great to hear that you were able to get around easily, you found our staff friendly and helpful and you enjoyed your stay very much.

We look forward to your next visit Francis S.


Scott J 
General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: Nice and close to the mall and restaurants. Staff was friendly! Great breakfast. Parking is tight but we always found a spot. However, there were issues with our thermostat that did not get resolved before we left. Ended up just turning it off. I had a hard time falling asleep in the hot room. Cleaner threw out collectable empty beer bottles I was saving as souvenirs (I get they didn't know but it was a serious bummer).
featured_reviews.review_text: Nice and close to the mall and restaurants. Staff was friendly! Great breakfast. Parking is tight but we always found a spot. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Ahmad, 

Thank you for your comments. I am sorry to hear of your dissatisfaction with your stay. Did you contact us so we could help with the heat in your room? Reviewing my departmental managers logs I do not see any report from the room you stayed in. Please feel free to contact front desk next time you decide to stay with us, we will be pleased to help you.

Warm regards, 

Scott Johnson 
General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id:
The hotel is perfectly located in the heart of Metrotown. Great dinning options at walking distance. 
Overall room was comfortable and clean, but the bathroom could use an update.
I stayed here for a planned trip to hike Grouse Mountain, and this location provided a nice short drive, allowing me to make the most out of the morning.
